verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلْح<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓقَّةُ
verses.translation: Неотвратимое

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13857'>ٱ</tajweed>لْح<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓقَّةُ
verses.translation: Что есть неотвратимость

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13858'>دْ</tajweed>رَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>كَ مَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13857'>ٱ</tajweed>لْح<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓقَّةُ
verses.translation: Что даст тебе понять, Что значит неизбежность

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ وَعَا<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13859'>دُۢ ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13860'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَارِعَةِ
verses.translation: Люди Самуд и Ад то, что грядет, назвали ложью

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا ثَمُودُ فَأُهْلِكُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13861'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّاغِيَةِ
verses.translation: Погублены за это были самудяне страшным гулом, (Что предвещал землетрясенье)

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا عَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13862'>دٌ ف</tajweed>َأُهْلِكُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِرِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13863'>حٍ ص</tajweed>َرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
verses.translation: Погублены за это были и адиты Стремительным, ревущим ураганом

verses.text_uthmani: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى ٱلْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':158'>بْ</tajweed>عَ لَيَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13864'>لٍ و</tajweed>َثَمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13865'>مًا ف</tajweed>َتَرَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13866'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Sakhkharahā 'alaihim sab'a layāliw wa ṡamāniyata ayyām(in), ḥusūman fataral-qauma fīhā ṣar'ā, ka'annahum a'jāzu nakhlin khāwiyah(tin).
verses.translation: Аллах заставил бушевать его над ними Все восемь дней и семь ночей подряд. (И будь ты там), ты б мог увидеть весь народ, Что (в смерти) был подобен срубленным стволам Дуплистых пальмовых деревьев

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَهَلْ تَرَىٰ لَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':1812'>ُم م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13867'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َاقِيَةٍ
verses.translation: Ужель ты видишь хоть одну живую душу, (Что избежала б наказанья)

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَآءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَن قَبْلَهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَـٰتُ بِٱلْخَاطِئَةِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13868'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13869'>بْ</tajweed>لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13870'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُؤْتَفِكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13871'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَاطِئَةِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa jā'a fir'aunu wa man qablahū wal-mu'tafikātu bil-khāṭi'ah(ti).
verses.translation: И Фараон, и те, что жили до него, И опрокинутые города (в долине Тувы) - Все совершали (тяжкие) грехи

verses.text_uthmani: فَعَصَوْا۟ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَّابِيَةً
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَعَصَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13872'>ةً ر</tajweed>َّابِيَةً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa 'aṣau rasūla rabbihim fa akhażahum akhżatar rābiyah(tan).
verses.translation: И отвергали каждого посланника Аллаха, - За то их наказал Аллах сполна

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلْمَآءُ حَمَلْنَـٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْجَارِيَةِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا طَغَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13873'>ٱ</tajweed>لْم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ حَمَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كُمْ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13874'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَارِيَةِ
verses.translation: Когда ж из берегов своих излились воды, Мы понесли вас по воде в плавучем (кОвше)

verses.text_uthmani: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٌ وَٰعِيَةٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِنَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13875'>جْ</tajweed>عَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13876'>ةً و</tajweed>َتَعِيَه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُذُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13877'>نٌ و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>عِيَةٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Linaj'alahā lakum tażkirataw wa ta'iyahā użunuw wā'iyah(tun).
verses.translation: Чтоб это стало всем предупрежденьем И чтоб внимающее ухо (Урок сей) в памяти несло

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4185'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صُّورِ نَفْخَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13878'>ةٌ و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِدَةٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa iżā nufikha fiṣ-ṣūri nafkhatuw wāḥidah(tun).
verses.translation: И вот когда раздастся первый трубный глас

verses.text_uthmani: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَٰحِدَةً
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَحُمِلَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13879'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8957'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13880'>ةً و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِدَةً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ḥumilatil-arḍu wal-jibālu fa dukkatā dakkataw wāḥidah(tan).
verses.translation: И будут сдвинуты и стерты в порошок Одним ударом и земля, и горы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَيَوْمَئِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13881'>ذٍ و</tajweed>َقَعَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13200'>ٱ</tajweed>لْوَاقِعَةُ
verses.translation: В тот День (Великое) событие случится

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13882'>نش</tajweed>َقَّتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13883'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ فَهِىَ يَوْمَئِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13884'>ذٍ و</tajweed>َاهِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Расколется небесный свод, - Ведь небо в этот День непрочным будет

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرْجَآئِهَا ۚ وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَـٰنِيَةٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلَكُ عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَرْج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِهَا‌ۚ وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13885'>ذٍ ث</tajweed>َمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نِيَةٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wal-malaku 'alā arjā'ihā, wa yaḥmilu 'arsya rabbika fauqahum yauma'iżin ṡamāniyah(tun).
verses.translation: И восемь ангелов со всех концов его В тот День Над ними понесут Трон вашего Владыки

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَئِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13886'>ذٍ ت</tajweed>ُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':344'>نك</tajweed>ُمْ خَافِيَةٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yauma'iżin tu'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyah(tun).
verses.translation: В тот День Вы будете приведены на Суд (Господень), И там ничто сокрытое не утаится

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقْرَءُوا۟ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بِيَمِينِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَيَقُولُ ه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓؤُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13887'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13888'>قْ</tajweed>رَءُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> كِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِيَهْ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa ammā man ūtiya kitābahū biyamīnihī fa yaqūlu hā'umuqra'ū kitābiyah.
verses.translation: И тот, кому представят Книгу (земных деяний) в праву руку, Скажет: "Вот вам! Читайте мою Книгу

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى ظَنَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13889'>نت</tajweed>ُ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى مُلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قٍ حِسَابِيَهْ
verses.translation: Поистине, (всегда) я знал, что (День наступит), Когда я встречу свой расчет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13890'>ةٍ ر</tajweed>َّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: Сей человек получит вечное блаженство

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِى جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: В Саду возвышенном

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Где фрукты обильно клонятся (к рукам)

verses.text_uthmani: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَآ أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَيَّامِ ٱلْخَالِيَةِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كُلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':300'>ٱ</tajweed>شْرَبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> هَنِ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>يٓـ</tajweed>ـ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':12907'>ـَٔۢا ب</tajweed>ِم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13891'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَيَّامِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13892'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَالِيَةِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Kulū wasyrabū hanī'am bimā aslaftum fil-ayyāmil-khāliyah(ti).
verses.translation: И ешьте вы, и пейте там Во здравие за то, что (на земле) В истекшие года вы совершили

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بِشِمَالِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> فَيَقُولُ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِيَهْ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ammā man ūtiya kitābahū bisyimālih(ī), fa yaqūlu yā laitanī lam ūta kitābiyah.
verses.translation: А тот, кому представят книгу в леву руку, Скажет: "О, если б только эту книгу мне не дали

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَمْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13893'>دْ</tajweed>رِ مَا حِسَابِيَهْ
verses.translation: О, если б никогда не знать мне моего расчета

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَيْتَهَا كَانَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13894'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَاضِيَةَ
verses.translation: О, если бы (земная смерть) была моим концом

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَغْنَىٰ عَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى مَالِيَهْۜ
verses.translation: Мои богатства мне не помогли

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هَلَكَ عَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى سُلْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نِيَهْ
verses.translation: Вся власть (души моей) исчезла!" [Затем последует приказ]

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: خُذُوهُ فَغُلّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>هُ
verses.translation: Взять и связать его

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13895'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَحِيمَ صَلّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>هُ
verses.translation: И жечь его на адовом костре

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ فِى سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَٱسْلُكُوهُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ فِى سِلْسِلَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13896'>ةٍ ذ</tajweed>َرْعُهَا سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13897'>بْ</tajweed>عُونَ ذِرَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13898'>عًا ف</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13899'>ٱ</tajweed>سْلُك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>هُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡumma fī silsilatin żar'uhā sab'ūna żirā'an faslukūh(u).
verses.translation: Затем заставить его шествовать в цепи Длиною в семьдесят локтей

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':32'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13900'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Поистине, он не уверовал в Великого Аллаха

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13901'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمِسْك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Дать пищу бедняку не побуждал

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَيْسَ لَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13902'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمَ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُنَا حَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.translation: И для него сегодня нет здесь друга

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ غِسْل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lā ṭa'āmun illā min gislīn(in).
verses.translation: И нет иной еды, помимо нечистот

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَّا يَأْكُلُهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> إِلَّا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13903'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>طِــٔ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Которые никто не ест, - Помимо тех, кто во грехе

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13287'>قْ</tajweed>سِمُ بِمَا تُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8674'>بْ</tajweed>صِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: В знак Моего (знаменья), Что взору вашему открыто

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا لَا تُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8674'>بْ</tajweed>صِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: А также в знак того, чего не зрите вы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَقَوْلُ رَسُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13904'>لٍ ك</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: Поистине, сие есть слово Достойного посланника (Аллаха)

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13905'>رٍ‌ۚ ق</tajweed>َلِيل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4583'>اً م</tajweed>َّا تُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā huwa biqauli syā'ir(in), qalīlam mā tu'minūn(a).
verses.translation: А не поэта, - О, как же мало веруете вы

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13906'>نٍ‌ۚ ق</tajweed>َلِيل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4583'>اً م</tajweed>َّا تَذَكَّر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lā biqauli kāhin(in), qalīlam mā tażakkarūn(a).
verses.translation: Не прорицателя, - О, как же мало вас увещевают

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11949'>نز</tajweed>ِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12045'>لٌ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4772'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّبِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Сие - Послание Владыки всех миров

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَوْ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيْنَا بَعْضَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13907'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَقَاو<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>لِ
verses.translation: И если бы посланник сей Свои реченья Нашим именем нарек

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11402'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Его б схватили Мы за праву руку

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ لَقَطَعْنَا مِنْهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13908'>ٱ</tajweed>لْوَت<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Потом Мы рассекли б сердечную артерию его

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَـٰجِزِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَمَا مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':344'>نك</tajweed><tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':431'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>جِز<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И не было б ни одного из вас, Кто мог бы защитить его (от гнева вашего Владыки)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَتَذْكِرَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13909'>ةٌ ل</tajweed>ِّلْمُتَّق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Поистине, сие - Напоминание для тех, Кто гнева Божьего страшится

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَنَعْلَمُ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':344'>نك</tajweed><tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13910'>ُم م</tajweed>ُّكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa innā lana'lamu anna minkum mukażżibīn(a).
verses.translation: И знаем Мы: поистине, средь вас есть и такие, Которые сие (Напоминанье) ложью нарекают

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَحَسْرَةٌ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':468'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Поистине, оно - причина (всех несчастий) для неверных

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَحَقُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13911'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Оно ведь истинная несомненность

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَسَبِّحْ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13285'>ٱ</tajweed>سْمِ رَبِّكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13286'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: А потому славь имя Бога твоего, Всевышнего Владыки
